description: Shinozaki Mikoto is the main protagonist of the series, 1st year student and the third member of the schools cycling club. Originally living a quiet boring life and getting bullied daily by the upperclassmen. Until one day when http://anidb.net/ch13760 [Fukazawa Yuki] asks him to join the schools cycling club. Though he rejects this proposal at first as he, due to a childhood trauma he has forgotten, finds bicycles to be scary and thus he also doesn`t remember how to ride one.
name: Shinozaki Mikoto
